text: Ciocanu is a Romanian proper name. It can refer to: ;Places *Ciocanu, a village in Dâmbovicioara Commune, Argeș County, Romania *Ciocanu Monastery, a monastery in Bughea de Jos Commune, Argeș County, Romania ;People *Anatol Ciocanu (n. 1940), Moldovan and Romanian poet and publicist *Ion Ciocanu (n. 1940), Moldovan and Romanian literary critic, philologist, pedagogue and writer *Vasile Ciocanu (1942–2003), Romanian literary historian and philologist ==See also== *Ciocan Category:Romanian-language surnames
title: Ciocanu
